newsitem.title: THAILAND: Media of Medias '96 profit above target.
newsitem.headline: Media of Medias '96 profit above target.

text.p: Thai media firm Media of Medias Plc said on Monday its net profit in 1996 was higher than previously expected due to the rising advertising revenue in the year.

"We earlier projected that the net profit in 1996 would rise about 37 percent (over 1995). According to preliminary figures, the profit for all of 1996 will be higher than the previous projection," Media of Media president Kosit Suvinitjit told a news conference.
Kosit would not be more precise about the 1996 net figure.
In 1995, Media of Medias posted a net profit of 106 million baht ($4.24 million).
Kosit said Media of Medias had increased its television programmes last year, leading to the rise in advertising revenues.
"Our core business this year will still be television programmes. We will also expand into the music and movie businesses," he said.
Media of Medias also planned to enter international markets by producing television programmes in Indonesia, Burma and Malaysia, he added.
